Class Sunflower

java.lang.Object
Plant
Sunflower
public class Sunflower extends Plant
This class defines the behavior and properties of a Sunflower plant in the game. It is responsible for handling its sun production logic, cooldowns, and interactions within the game environment.
Since:
2025-06-27

    • tryToAction

      public void tryToAction(Board b, double elapsedTime)
      Attempts to make the Sunflower produce sun. Produces sun if its internal production cooldown is met.
      Specified by:
      tryToAction in class Plant
      Parameters:
      b - board containing plant
      elapsedTime - Time elapsed since last update.
